p: All results are presented as mean Â± SD of three independent biological replicates. Data analysis was done with GraphPad Prism 8 using the unpaired Student t test or one-way ANOVA. Statistical significance was achieved at P < 0.05. In the figures, * P < 0.05; ** P < 0.01; *** P < 0.001; **** P < 0.0001; and ns represents nonsignificance ( P > 0.05).
